title: Workshop on Developing Language Education Design Strategies Using Generative AI

context.prior_knowledge: Experience in designing secondary education curricula, foundational proficiency in digital tool utilization
context.additional_context: Targeting corporate teacher trainers and in-service secondary school teachers. Exploring the application of generative AI in VR/simulation environments.

learning_goals: Learners can distinguish and explain three or more frameworks for divergent/convergent learning design using generative AI.
Learners can develop two or more language lesson scenarios incorporating generative AI tools in a VR-based simulation environment.
Learners can collaboratively develop rubrics to evaluate the pedagogical effectiveness of generative AI-integrated instructional design.
difficulty: Moderate - Standard complexity with some constraints
